profile:
At Reliance Gregg's, the safety and well-being of both our Customers and our Team Members is always our top priority. We are actively monitoring the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation and are taking precautionary measures to aid in keeping our communities safe. We have implemented strict safety protocols to provide both our Customers and Team members with peace of mind during this challenging time. We continue to provide the exceptional customer experiences we are so well known for and want you to know that we are here for you when you need us.

To help with prevention, we are taking the following precautionary measures to protect our Customers.

Our Team Members have been equipped with an ample supply of:

* Hand sanitizers
* Disinfectant wipes
* Masks
* Single-use gloves
* Boot covers

We know that this is a difficult time for all and we want you to know that we will be there for you and are taking all the necessary precautions to keep you and your family comfortable and safe.


At Reliance Gregg’s Plumbing and Heating Saskatoon, we believe your business is something we must earn every day. That’s why our entire local team is always there to support your unique needs and exceed your customer service expectations, with knowledgeable advice and expertise.

In fact, we’ve been taking care of our community’s home comfort needs for nearly three decades. And, like you, we’re proud to work and live in the City of Bridges, as well as service the Martensville, Warman and surrounding areas.

At Reliance Gregg’s, we work hard to be your first call for any HVAC, electrical and plumbing needs, as well as for duct cleaning and indoor air quality solutions. So please give us a call anytime – we’re always happy to help.
888-837-1451 is a TOLL FREE No., please feel free to contact!!
